id.description: The unique identifier for the invoice item category.

name.description: The name of the invoice item category.

use_as_service.description: Indicates whether the category is used as a service type.

use_as_expense.description: Indicates whether the category is used as an expense type.

created_at.description: The date and time when the invoice item category was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the invoice item category was last updated.
